TextView.android:text: Issuance/ Re-Issuance of Identification Card and Purchase Booklet for Person with Disability

Persons with disability shall be entitled to at least twenty percent (20) discount for purchase of medicines, medical and dental services, admission fees charged by theaters, utilization of all services in hotels, restaurants, public and transportation, air and sea transport
1. Submit Application form Version 4.0 duly accomplished with requirements (1 original copy) for New Applicant / renewal
Local Civil Registry Office/ Philippine Statistics Authority
1.3. Certificate of Disability (1 original copy) New Applicant/ Renewal/ Re-issuance)
ISSUANCE OF PWD ID CARD (NEW APPLICANT/ RENEWAL and REISSUANCE for LOST ID)
2.3. Facilitates approval of MSWDO and LCE
3. Client receives the requested PWD ID Card or Purchase Booklet
3.1. Releases PWD Identification card or Purchase Booklet
1. Client comes to office and manifests to apply/request for PWD Purchase Booklet (Medicine/basic Commodities)
2. Client receives the requested Purchase Booklet
3. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Service (CSS) Form and drop in the CSS drop box
3.1. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Service (CSS) form
